localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Aviron is the high intensity version of Peloton for rowing; use the 22” touchscreen to browse 250+ workouts like competitive games and live races with friends. High intensity workouts are short, improve cognitive ability and help slow the aging process.
blogPost.body: Aviron is the high intensity version of Peloton for rowing; use the 22” touchscreen to browse 250+ workouts like competitive games and live races with friends. High intensity workouts are short, improve cognitive ability and help slow the aging process.
blogPost.title: Aviron Interactive Rower - High-intensity version of Peloton for rowing
blogPost.author: Lindsay Amos

localize.description: Aviron是划船运动的Peloton的高强度版本；使用22英寸触摸屏浏览250+训练，如竞技游戏和与朋友的现场比赛。高强度锻炼时间短，提高认知能力，有助于延缓衰老。
Aviron是划船運動的Peloton的高強度版本；使用22英寸觸摸屏瀏覽250+訓練，如競技遊戲和與朋友的現場比賽。高強度鍛鍊時間短，提高認知能力，有助於延緩衰老。

previous.excerpt: Bring documents from everyday life into a collaborative environment built for teams. Video chat, edit files, and work together with your team on an endless canvas.
previous.title: RendezView - The endless canvas built for work

localize.description: 将日常生活中的文件带入为团队打造的协作环境中。视频聊天、编辑文件，与您的团队一起在无尽的画布上工作。
localize.tagline: 为工作而建的无尽画布

localize.description: 將日常生活中的文件帶入爲團隊打造的協作環境中。視頻聊天、編輯文件，與您的團隊一起在無盡的畫布上工作。
localize.tagline: 爲工作而建的無盡畫布

RT @carlquintanilla：农业通胀来了。

玉米价格自2013年7月以来最高。

大豆价格自2014年6月以来最高。

(via @pboockvar) ht...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text:
Hier kommt die Agflation. 

Maispreise am höchsten seit Juli 2013. 

Sojabohnen am höchsten seit Juni 2014. 

(via @pboockvar) https://t.co/8huuxSS7zs
